statements: SELECT * FROM lobbying_activities;
SELECT official_name, organization_name, activity_date FROM lobbying_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT activity_type, organization_name FROM lobbying_activities WHERE official_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM lobbying_activities WHERE activity_type IN ('meeting', 'event');
SELECT official_name, organization_name FROM lobbying_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM lobbying_activities WHERE organization_name = 'Company A';
SELECT activity_type, official_name FROM lobbying_activities WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY official_name DESC;
SELECT official_name, organization_name FROM lobbying_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Meeting' AND activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM lobbying_activities WHERE organization_name LIKE '%Corp%';
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(*) as activity_count FROM lobbying_activities GROUP BY activity_type HAVING activity_count > 1 ORDER BY activity_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM lobbying_activities;
SELECT lobbyist_id, activity_description FROM lobbying_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT official_name, official_position FROM government_officials WHERE government_department = 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM government_officials ORDER BY official_name ASC;
SELECT lobbyist_id, activity_description FROM lobbying_activities WHERE activity_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM lobbying_activities;
SELECT lobbyist_id, government_official_id, activity_date, activity_description FROM lobbying_activities WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;

SELECT l.activity_date, l.activity_description, go.official_name, go.official_position FROM lobbying_activities l INNER JOIN government_officials go ON l.government_official_id = go.official_id WHERE go.government_department = 'Finance' AND l.activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT DISTINCT go.official_position, COUNT(l.lobbyist_id) AS num_lobbyists FROM lobbying_activities l INNER JOIN government_officials go ON l.government_official_id = go.official_id GROUP BY go.official_position HAVING num_lobbyists > 1 ORDER BY num_lobbyists DESC;

SELECT go.official_name, COUNT(*) AS num_activities FROM lobbying_activities l INNER JOIN government_officials go ON l.government_official_id = go.official_id GROUP BY go.official_name ORDER BY num_activities DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM lobby_activities;
SELECT activity_type, lobbyist_name, description FROM lobby_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM government_officials WHERE department='Finance';
SELECT official_name, position FROM government_officials WHERE official_id=3;
SELECT firm_name, total_clients FROM lobbyist_firms WHERE industry_focus='Healthcare' ORDER BY total_clients DESC;
SELECT official_name, department, position FROM government_officials WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY official_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM government_officials WHERE department IN ('Healthcare', 'Technology') AND position = 'Director'
SELECT firm_name, total_clients FROM lobbyist_firms WHERE industry_focus = 'Energy' ORDER BY total_clients DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT activity_type, activity_date, lobbyist_name FROM lobby_activities WHERE lobbyist_name = 'John Doe' AND activity_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT description FROM lobby_activities WHERE lobbyist_name = 'Jane Smith' AND activity_type = 'Meeting'
SELECT * FROM lobbying_agencies;
SELECT agency_name, location FROM lobbying_agencies ORDER BY agency_name DESC;
SELECT official_name, official_title, department FROM government_officials WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT client_name, industry FROM lobbying_clients WHERE total_expenditure > 10000;
SELECT * FROM lobbying_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date ASC, interaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM lobbying_agencies WHERE location = 'Washington, D.C.';
SELECT agency_name, total_budget FROM lobbying_agencies ORDER BY total_budget DESC;
SELECT official_name, department, agency_name FROM government_officials GO JOIN lobbying_agencies LA ON GO.official_id = LA.agency_id WHERE LA.location = 'New York';
SELECT client_name, industry, total_expenditure FROM lobbying_clients WHERE total_expenditure > 100000 ORDER BY total_expenditure ASC;
SELECT * FROM lobbying_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT * FROM lobbyists;
SELECT name, organization FROM lobbyists WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM government_officials WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT official_id, name, position FROM government_officials ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT lobbyist_id, official_id, activity_date FROM lobbying_activities WHERE activity_date <= '2022-05-31';
SELECT * FROM lobbyists WHERE organization = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT name, organization FROM lobbyists ORDER BY organization DESC;
SELECT * FROM government_officials WHERE department = 'Finance' AND position = 'Manager';
SELECT name, department, position FROM government_officials WHERE position LIKE '%Director%';
SELECT * FROM lobbying_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
